titleStmt.title: The assaute and co[n]quest of heuen tra[n]slated out of frenche into englishe by Thomas Paynel.
titleStmt.author: Paynell, Thomas.

publicationStmt.publisher: In fletestrete, in the house of Thomas Berthelet, nere to the Cu[n]dite, at the sygne of Lucrece,
publicationStmt.date: The yere of our lorde. 1529. The 10. daye of Marche]

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
